DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase IV , comparative study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Motiltone速 in treatment of the patients with functional dyspepsia. The study is conducted with following methods: multi-centers, double blind, randomization, parallel. The subjects will receive Motilitone速 or/and Pantoline速.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Demonstrate the Efficacy and Safety of Motilitone速
DOC.criteria: Roman III criteria One or more conditions are applied: epigastralgia, burning feelings in the solar plexus early satiety, uncomfortable fullness No organic lesion has been administered or was administered within a month had a surgery that might affect gastrointestinal motility Tegaserod
